mapper.select: select c.no as catNo, c.name as catName, b.no as postNo, b.title as title, b.contents as contents, b.reg_date as reg_date, ifnull((b.cnt), '0') as postCounts from category c left join (select no, title, contents, reg_date, category_no, count(*) as cnt from post group by category_no) b on c.no = b.category_no where c.blog_id = #{blog_id} order by reg_date desc

select b.no as postNo, b.title as title, b.contents as contents, b.reg_date as reg_date, b.category_no as catNo from post b join (select * from category order by no desc limit 1) c on c.no = b.category_no where c.blog_id = #{blog_id} order by reg_date desc

select title, contents from post where no=#{postNo} and category_no=#{catNo}
